mtext: Our highly skilled medical professionals narrate the events in chronological order, including all the vital/critical information and present it in an easily understandable manner.The summaries are prepared by our team of experienced medical professionals, with each summary tailored to various case types factoring all medical events.The medical events include both pre-existing and current injuries suffered by the patient. The main purpose is to provide attorneys with clear and crisp information on the medical aspects involved,thus facilitating appropriate actions on their part.
